title: 🦅 Peaceful Getaway From the City 🦅 2 bed 2 bath
posting_body: This is a great community that is tucked away in a quiet community of Austin.
Surround yourself with nature, be next to the river, and take solace in your humble spot.
- Tranquil pool with grills and fire pit
- 24 hr fitness center, private spa and steam room.
- Brand new apartment interiors with contemporary finishes
Text for more info or a tour and we'll get you set!
My service is 100% FREE for you!
*Pricing and lease terms subject to change by the property.
Pictures are taken from the property but may not be exact unit.
I can get you all the detailed info over to you.*
